item.description:
Kick back and play at ANOTHER post-holiday Open Studio Day!

DAY/TIME: Saturday, Jan. 3, 2009--1 to 8 p.m. (or later, if people want). Come for an hour or two; come for the whole day.

AGENDA: No scheduled activities. Arrive and leave when you want. Work on your own projects at your own pace.

AMENITIES: Free parking. Table space and a chair. Access to some tools (paper cutter, heat gun, etc.). Access to a fridge, microwave, toaster oven, kitchen sink and restroom.

COST: $5, regardless of how long you stay.

WHO MAY ATTEND: Any member of the NE ATC+ or Altered Art/Assemblage Meetups who has already attended at least one regular Meetup.

WHAT TO BRING: Your own materials and projects to work on (just as you do for the regular Meetup). A few basic supplies--scissors, glue, tape, etc. -- are available for loan.

HOW TO SIGN UP: You must RSVP "yes" using Meetup's RSVP function so we know who's coming and how many to expect. If your plans change, switch your RSVP to "no" as soon as possible, right up to the morning of the event.

CANCELLATIONS: If you need to cancel after the Open Studio has started, please call the Open Studio host so she knows not to expect you. You should receive the host's phone number (and the Studio address) a day or two in advance.

If we need to cancel for any reason, we'll post a message here AND e-mail anyone who's RSVP'd as far in advance as we can--at least a few hours before the event--or, at all possible, the previous night. Be sure to check your e-mail or the Web for updates before leaving home.

And if you can't make it this time, don't fret -- we'll be offering MANY more of these.

group.name: New England Artist Trading Cards Plus (ATCs+) Meetup Group

item.name: Another post-holiday Open Studio: Saturday, 01/03/09
